title: Extract Second from Date and Time
description:
SECOND_OF_DT extracts the second from a current DT value.
SECOND_OF_DT(DT#2008-6-6-10:22:20) = 20
name: SECOND_OF_DT

input.name: XDT
input.description: The date and time value from which the second component will be extracted.

return_value.description: An integer representing the second component extracted from the input date and time.
